sentence.text: Patients exhibit a variety of symptoms predominantly linked to the function of regulation of alternative mRNA splicing, via spliceosome protein in the nervous system like autistic behavior and mild-to-severe intellectual disability.

entity.text: regulation of alternative mRNA splicing, via spliceosome

sentence.text: Fragile-X (FraX) individuals also display cellular and morphological negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II including branched dendritic spines, large ears, and macroorchidism.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
